casebody.data:
In the Matter of Appeal of SCHWARZ & SCHWARZ, INC. from the valuation by Caldwell County of certain real property regarding property taxation for tax year 2001. No. 182P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Jennifer Fountain, for Schwarz & Schwarz. David Lackey, Lenoir, for Caldwell County.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th day of April 2004 by Appellant (Schwarz & Schwarz, Inc.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
